title: When will the Reworked Poppy actually be released
body: So Today i bought poppy because I found out she had a rework today and played her but to find out its the same ole poppy any information when they are going to release her

replies.body: What day will be poppy reworked released?

> [{quoted}](name=djbamboo,realm=NA,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lRz31rK9,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-12-09T04:21:13.420+0000)
>
> What day will be poppy reworked released?

Now
Hopefully not until Riot has ample time to balance her.
Considering she's already been announced, most likely next patch. So 2-3 weeks.

You'll still have about almost 2 weeks to paly the original Poppy- I assume that the reworked version gets released on Patch 5.24, which will be somewhere around Tuesday, next-next week.

Go. Abuse the full AP 1v5 Poppy while you still can ;)
